cnf:field.name: Application
cnf:field.preset: TruSeq DNA sequencing (large genome de novo)
TruSeq DNA sequencing (small genome de novo)

ptp:process-type.name: Aggregate QC (Library Validation) 5.0

parameter.name: Aggregate QC Flags and Copy Fields
parameter.string: bash -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {processURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:setUDF -f 'Progress' -t '//input/@uri->//sample/@uri' -v 'Library preparation and QC validation complete' script:aggregateQC -c 'true' -a 'true' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid0} -aggregatelog {compoundOutputFileLuid1} -copylog {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Aggregation Script Log,QC Flag Aggregation Log,QC UDF Copy Log}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display and maximize the Input/Output Explorer mini-tabbed page

ptp:process-type.name: Bioanalyzer QC (DNA) 5.0

field-definition.name: Use strict matching for Bioanalyzer results

parameter.name: Parse Bioanalyzer XML and assign QC flags

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Bioanalyzer Driver File,Bioanalyzer Driver File Generation Log File,Bioanalyzer XML Result File (required),Result File (optional),PDF Summary File (optional),Bioanalyzer XML Parsing Log File,QC Assignment Log File,QC Assignment Report}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

parameter.name: Parse CaliperGX CSV
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {processURI:v2} -u {username} -p {password} script:parseCSV -inputFile {compoundOutputFileLuid2} -log {compoundOutputFileLuid3} -headerRow '1' -separator 'comma' -containerName 'Plate Name' -wellPosition 'Well Label' -measurementUDFMap 'Concentration::Conc. (ng/ul)' -measurementUDFMap 'Size (bp)::Size [BP]' -measurementUDFMap 'Size at Max (bp)::Size at Maximum [BP]' -measurementUDFMap 'Molarity (nmol/L)::Molarity (nmol/l)' -matchOutput 'true' -relaxed 'true' script:assignQC -log {compoundOutputFileLuid4} -qcResult {compoundOutputFileLuid5}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Driver File,Driver File Log,CaliperGX WellTable (required),CaliperGX Parsing Log File,QC Assignment Log File,QC Assignment Report}

parameter.name: Parse CaliperGX CSV
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {processURI:v2} -u {username} -p {password} script:parseCSV -inputFile {compoundOutputFileLuid2} -log {compoundOutputFileLuid3} -headerRow '1' -separator 'comma' -containerName 'Plate Name' -wellPosition 'Well Label' -measurementUDFMap 'Concentration::Region[50-4500] Conc. (ng/ul)' -measurementUDFMap 'Size (bp)::Region[50-4500] Size [BP]' -measurementUDFMap 'Size at Max (bp)::Region[50-4500] Size at Maximum [BP]' -measurementUDFMap 'Molarity (nmol/L)::Region[50-4500] Molarity (nmol/l)' -matchOutput 'true' -relaxed 'true' script:assignQC -log {compoundOutputFileLuid4} -qcResult {compoundOutputFileLuid5}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Driver File,Driver File Log,CaliperGX WellTable (CSV required),CaliperGX Parsing Log File,QC Assignment Log File,QC Assignment Report}

ptp:process-type.name: EMC Aggregate QC (DNA) 5.0

parameter.name: Aggregate QC Flags and Copy Fields
parameter.string: bash -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {processURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:setUDF -f 'Progress' -t '//input/@uri->//sample/@uri' -v 'Initial sample QC complete' script:aggregateQC -c 'true' -a 'true' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid0} -aggregatelog {compoundOutputFileLuid1} -copylog {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Aggregation Script Log,QC Flag Aggregation Log,QC UDF Copy Log}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display and maximize the Input/Output Explorer mini-tabbed page

ptp:process-type.name: NanoDrop QC (DNA) 5.0

parameter.name: Parse NanoDrop NDT and assign QC flags
parameter.string: bash -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {processURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:parseCSV -inputFile {compoundOutputFileLuid2} -log {compoundOutputFileLuid3} -headerRow '1' -separator 'TAB' -sampleLocation 'Sample ID' -measurementUDFMap 'Concentration::Conc.' -measurementUDFMap 'A260/280 ratio::260/280' -measurementUDFMap 'A260/230 ratio::260/230' -measurementUDFMap 'A260::A260' -relaxed 'true' script:assignQC -log {compoundOutputFileLuid4} -qcResult {compoundOutputFileLuid5}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:NanoDrop Driver File,NanoDrop Driver File Generation Log File,NanoDrop NDT Result File (required),NanoDrop NDT Parsing Log File,QC Assignment Log File,QC Assignment Report}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

ptp:process-type.name: PicoGreen QC (DNA) 5.0

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Template File (Excel),PicoGreen Result File,QC Assignment Log File,QC Assignment Report}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

ptp:process-type.name: qPCR QC 5.0

parameter.name: Volume Adjustment
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -excludeControls true -exp ' input.::Library Volume (ul):: = input.::Library Volume (ul)::-output.::Volume Used (ul):: ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid3}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:qPCR Result File,QC Assignment Log File,QC Assignment Report,Volume Adjustment Log}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

ptp:process-type.name: qPCR QC 5.0 McGill 1.0

parameter.name: 1. Volume Adjustment
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -excludeControls true -exp ' input.::Library Volume (ul):: = input.::Library Volume (ul)::-output.::Volume Used (ul):: ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid3}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Excel Driver file,Assignment Log File,qPCR Report File (Excel)}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

ptp:process-type.name: Qubit QC (DNA) 5.0

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Qubit Result File,QC Assignment Log File,QC Assignment Report}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

parameter.name: 3. Route by python
parameter.string: bash -c "/usr/bin/python /opt/gls/clarity/customextensions/Common/route_by_template.py -u {username} -p {password} -s {stepURI:v2} -r 'Go To Next Step,False,Affymetrix Axiom Genotyping McGill 1.0,DNA Amplification McGill 1.1\nGo To Next Step,True,Sample Normalization,Sample Normalization Extra Plate' -l {compoundOutputFileLuid0}"

parameter.name: 1. Check samples status from JSON file
Parse Tapestation XML and assign QC flags

process-output.output-name: {LIST:TapeStation Input SampleTable,Sample Table Generation Log,Tapestation Output XML (required),Tapestation XML Parsing Log,QC Assignment Log,QC Assignment Report}
